title: Planted Duck Spring Rolls
instructions: Cook the planted.duck in a pan with sesame oil until crispy, then shred into thin strips using two forks.
Mix the shredded duck with finely sliced cabbage, carrots, spring onions, and a splash of soy sauce and hoisin.
Lay out spring roll wrappers and place 2-3 tablespoons of filling in the center of each wrapper.
Fold the bottom corner over the filling, fold in the sides, then roll tightly and seal the edge with water.
Heat vegetable oil to 180Â°C and deep-fry the spring rolls for 3-4 minutes until golden brown and crispy.
Drain on paper towels and serve hot with sweet chili sauce or plum dipping sauce.
